articles.title: Plans confirmed for new ICE facility in NH; documents reveal state officials knew for weeks
articles.description:
State documents released Feb. 3 by the ACLU of New Hampshire show that state officials knew about the new ICE facility as early as Jan. 12.

The post Plans confirmed for new ICE facility in NH; documents reveal state officials knew for weeks appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: State officials confirmed knowledge of new ICE facility in NH as of January 12.
Documents released by ACLU of New Hampshire on February 3 reveal this information.
Boston residents may face increased immigration enforcement and community tensions due to facility.

articles.title: Ex-Patriots coach Dante Scarnecchia isn’t panicking over Will Campbell’s play
articles.description:
“I’m putting him right back where he was.”

The post Ex-Patriots coach Dante Scarnecchia isn’t panicking over Will Campbell’s play appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Dante Scarnecchia reassures fans about Will Campbell's performance as left tackle.
Scarnecchia emphasizes continuity, stating, 'I’m putting him right back where he was.'
Boston residents can expect stability in the Patriots' offensive line moving forward.

articles.title: Video: Mike Vrabel shares message to distraught Patriots after Super Bowl loss
articles.description:
"We got a lot more days ahead of us. We got a lot more football left in our program.”

The post Video: Mike Vrabel shares message to distraught Patriots after Super Bowl loss appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Mike Vrabel addressed the Patriots after their Super Bowl loss on February 12, 2026.
He emphasized the importance of future games and the ongoing football program.
This message aims to uplift Boston fans and players for the upcoming season.

articles.title: Patriots reportedly make changes to coaching staff, move Williams to ‘high-ranking’ role
articles.description:
With Terrell Williams reportedly taking on a new role, Zak Kuhr is the favorite to take over as defensive coordinator.

The post Patriots reportedly make changes to coaching staff, move Williams to ‘high-ranking’ role appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots promote Terrell Williams to a high-ranking coaching role.
Zak Kuhr is favored to become the new defensive coordinator.
Changes may affect team performance and fan engagement in Boston.

articles.title: Pittsfield man, 69, killed in hit-and-run crash that dragged him ‘lengthy distance,’ DA says
articles.description:
The victim, William Colbert, 69, was dragged a "lengthy distance" after he became trapped underneath the car, the DA said.

The post Pittsfield man, 69, killed in hit-and-run crash that dragged him ‘lengthy distance,’ DA says appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: William Colbert, 69, was killed in a hit-and-run incident in Pittsfield.
The crash dragged him a 'lengthy distance' under the vehicle, according to the DA.
This incident raises concerns about pedestrian safety in the Pittsfield area.
